casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Andrew Maurice RANDOLPH, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 159306
COA: 321551 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 17, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before May 14, 2019.
